fields.comment: if 1, we use the root of our entity hierarchy instead of the immediate parent
fields.name: use_root_parent

fields.comment: if 1, we only inherit position. it is calculated as follows: parent_position + parent_offset * parent_scale
fields.name: only_position

fields.comment: if set, we apply the offset of parent HotSpot with this tag
fields.name: parent_hotspot_tag

fields.comment: if >= 0, the Nth sprite transform in parent entity is inherited
fields.name: parent_sprite_id

fields.comment: if 1, we use the immediate parent for rotation, no matter what other properties say
fields.name: always_use_immediate_parent_rotation

fields.comment: if 1, the rotation is set to 0 deg if scale >= 0 else to 180 deg
fields.name: rotate_based_on_x_scale
